tool_description: Get all crypto markets data live
name: Crypto Markets
title: Crypto Markets

api_list.name: Current Average Price
Kline/Candlestick Data
Compressed/Aggregate Trades List

optional_parameters.name: fromId
optional_parameters.description: id to get aggregate trades from INCLUSIVE.

optional_parameters.name: endTime
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp in ms to get aggregate trades until INCLUSIVE.

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp in ms to get aggregate trades from INCLUSIVE.

api_list.name: Exchange Information
api_list.description: Current exchange trading rules and symbol information

api_list.name: Order Book

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default 100; max 5000.
If limit > 5000, then the response will truncate to 5000.

api_list.name: Recent Trades List
Old Trade Lookup

optional_parameters.name: fromId
optional_parameters.description: Trade id to fetch from. Default gets most recent trades.

api_list.name: Symbol Order Book Ticker

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If neither parameter is sent, bookTickers for all symbols will be returned in an array.

api_list.name: Symbol Price Ticker

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If neither parameter is sent, prices for all symbols will be returned in an array.

api_list.name: 24hr Ticker Price Change Statistics

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description: If neither parameter is sent, tickers for all symbols will be returned in an array.
